content: *1* a simple tutorial of knitting a whale quick and easy knitting *2* you need to know cast on knit purl knit 2 stitches together yarn over knit stitch through the back loop *3* you will need yarn drops nord content 45% alpaca 30% polyamide 25% wool yarn group a weight/length 50 g /170 m or drops alpaca content 100% alpaca yarn group a weight/length 50 g /167 m needles 5pcs - 2 5 mm scissiors needle for sew stuffing plastic eyes and clue i used oval eyes stitch marker
